EmailTemplate.name: 201702_EMEAI_STC_Alert_CD-830_NJM.201702_EMEAI_STC_Alert_CD-830_NJM
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell | STC Alert - CD-830
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for the Aero Connectivity Briefing
Dear valued customers, partners, and friends,
We are pleased to invite you to the Honeywell GoDirect Operator Briefing in Nuremberg.
Date: Feb. 8, 2017 Location: The Mövenpick Conference Center at Nuremberg Airport Flughafenstraße 100, 90411 Nuremberg, Germany
This Aero Connectivity Briefing will give you a great overview and understanding of the latest within Honeywell GoDirect cabin connectivity products, solutions, services and technical support. A special focus will be on the new Honeywell Jetwave system and JetConnex service, based on Inmarsat’s new Global Express Ka-band network.
This event is co-hosted by Aero-Dienst and Inmarsat and is a great opportunity to have all your questions answered related to SATCOM products and solutions, services and the network, upgrade options and installation.
Topics include:
SATCOM connectivity updates | Ka-Band | SwiftBroadband | SBB-Safety | Flight Support Services | Hardware and Software updates | New applications | Technical Support | Jetwave ka-band demo.
If you are staying overnight, you can book hotel rooms at the Mövenpick Hotel Nürnberg-Airport at preferred rates of €115,00 per night including breakfast. You can book via phone (+49 911 35010) or email <[[mailto:hotel.nuernberg.airport@movenpick.com]]> and use the code HONEYWELL to benefit from these rates. Please note that the number of rooms at these rates are limited and will be provided on a “first come first served” basis.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER
More detailed agenda will follow soon.
